attributes.action: Close all schools after Friday 11th December due to risk of Covid
attributes.background: Schools are still allowed open and if someone becomes positive of Covid we will need to isolate for 2 weeks so that means we won’t be allowed to see family at Christmas of passing it on.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Implement a two week school lockdown before 24 December to save Christmas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015
